casebody.data:
State of Connecticut
v.
Juan Carlos Gonzalez Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2016

Elizabeth Knight Adams, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn. App. 298, 142 A.3d 1227 (2016), is denied.
